sense.def:
To weaken something
pomeni nekaj narediti manj močno ali vplivno.

seg.quote: Her armed forces had been weakened by the restriction on equipment supplies.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
weakens
, postane manj prepričan o svoji odločitvi.

seg.quote: Do you think she's beginning to weaken?

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
weakens someone
, povzroči, da nekdo izgubi nekaj svoje telesne moči.

seg.quote: I was weakened by my exertions.
